description: A Logia-type Devil Fruit that allows the user to create, control, and transform into various types of gas, making the user a Gas Human.

users.circumstances: Caesar Clown ate this fruit at an unknown time before his introduction.

abilityReveals.description: The user generates clouds of poisonous gas and sends them towards enemies.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar uses this against Luffy, though it proves ineffective due to Luffy's poison immunity.

abilityReveals.description: The user fills castanets with unstable gas and slams them together to create massive explosions.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar combines this with Smiley pieces to create a blinding explosion against Luffy.

abilityReveals.description: The user can remove oxygen from a specific area, suffocating opponents without visible attacks.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar uses this hidden ability to defeat Luffy, Robin, Franky, Smoker, and Tashigi simultaneously.

abilityReveals.description: As a Logia user, Caesar can transform into gas to avoid physical attacks and travel through confined spaces.
abilityReveals.firstUseContext: Caesar demonstrates his intangibility during the battle with Luffy.

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weakness - Armament Haki can touch the user
Many techniques require external tools like castanets

strengths.description: As a Logia user, Caesar can become gas to avoid damage.

strengths.strength: Versatile offensive capabilities with various gas types
strengths.description: Can create poisonous, explosive, and suffocating gases for different situations.

strengths.strength: Can control existing gases in the environment
strengths.description: Doesn't need to only generate gas, can manipulate oxygen and other atmospheric gases.
